content:
Curriculum - Master Biomedical Computing - TUM - TUM School of Computation, Information and Technology

Diese Seite ist nur auf Englisch verfügbar, da die Unterrichtssprache Englisch ist und wir für diesen Studiengang keinen Deutschnachweis fordern.

----------------------------------------

Curriculum Master Biomedical Computing
Curriculum Master Biomedical Computing
The successful completion of the Biomedical Computing Master Program requires 120 credits: 90 credits for lectures, exercises, seminars and practical courses; 30 credits for the Master's Thesis. The credits split up into compulsory and elective modules according to the following scheme:
Table (Curriculum Master Biomedical Computing):
Sem | Credits | Compulsory | Electives |  
30 | IN2021 Computer Aided Medical Procedures (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=473851&pOrgNr=14189) | Elective Course Catalog BMC (https://www.cit.tum.de/cit/studium/studiengaenge/master-biomedical-computing/#c2360) |  
Medical Instrumentation and Computer Aided Surgery (http://campar.in.tum.de/Chair/TeachingWs13MICAS) |  
30 | IN2022 Computer Aided Medical Procedures II (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=456378&pOrgNr=14189) | Elective Course Catalog BMC (https://www.cit.tum.de/cit/studium/studiengaenge/master-biomedical-computing/#c2360) |  
Medical Imaging Technology (http://www.rad.mri.tum.de/study/medImaging) |  
30 | IN2107 Master Seminar (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=485429&pOrgNr=14189) | Elective Course Catalog BMC (https://www.cit.tum.de/cit/studium/studiengaenge/master-biomedical-computing/#c2360) |  
IN2249 Clinical Internship (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=691074&pOrgNr=14189) |  
Medical Information Processing and Pathophysiology (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/wbModHb.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=1143420) |  
30 | Master's thesis (https://www.cit.tum.de/cit/studium/studiengaenge/master-biomedical-computing/#c2356)

*) the first number refers to students who start in winter term 2016/17 the second number to students who started before winter term 2016/17

Scheme for students who started in winter term 2016/17 or thereafter
Curriculum Master Biomedical Computing > Scheme for students who started in winter term 2016/17 or thereafter
- 26 credits for Compulsory Informatics Modules
- 16 credits for Compulsory Medical Modules
- minimum of 48 credits for Elective Modules, including Support Elective Modules

Scheme for students who started before winter term 2016/17
Curriculum Master Biomedical Computing > Scheme for students who started before winter term 2016/17
- 25 credits for Compulsory Informatics Modules
- 16 credits for Compulsory Medical Modules
- minimum of 49 credits for Elective Modules, including Support Elective Modules
Curriculum Master Biomedical Computing
----------------------------------------
